This is my favourite game on Steam. Level by level, you get taught how to play the game on a basic level, then you get to think outside of the box.

It's a puzzle based first person 3D Platform game. You're a female character in an orange jumpsuit called Chell. You navigate test chambers, solving puzzles that enable you to get to the elivator to the next test chamber.

The most fun element of this game is all the creative ways you can think of to use your Portal Gun. For the first few test chambers, you don't have a Portal Gun and you have to navigate the levels without one.

I can't recommend this game enough! It is amazing! I have an 11 year old PC with an NVidia GForce 9 and a Core2 Duo and it runs just fine. Well worth buying!

Muito bom! Quem gosta de jogos focados em quebra-cabeças vai adorar. Ainda conta com bons gráficos,  atmosfera de fundo intrigante, e jogabilidade diferenciada. Completei o título na versão nativa para Linux (ótimo desempenho) com um gamepad no padrão XBox (Gamesir T4 Pro). 

O único ponto negativo que encontrei para quem for jogar no gamepad foram os menus (que não são bem adaptados para controle, mas funcionam)
